sys_script_include.description: The InstallerAPI class supports scripted installation steps as part of the installation of a scoped app. Many functions accept the parameter strReason which is only used for logging and should explain why a certain change is made. | Methods: * initialize() * IsAborting() * Log() * Error() * FatalError() * Finish() * GenericAction() * RecordInsertOrUpdate() * RecordSetValue() * RecordDelete() * DictionarySetValue() * DictionaryOverrideSetValue() * DocumentationSetValue() * CheckTableCrossScopeAccessibility() * SetProperty() * SetHomePage() * SetTableValue() * SetTableAttribute() * SetTableColumnAttribute() * SetTableDefaultOrder() * ChoiceInsertOrUpdate() * ActivateChoice() * ChoiceSetDependentValue() * DiscoverySourceInsertOrUpdate() * DeleteView() * DeleteUISection() * InstallGlobalSystemProperty() * InstallSystemPropertyCategoryMapping() * ActivateBusinessRule() * ActivateClientScript() * ActivateUiAction() * ActivateUiPolicy() * ActivateServicePortal() * ActivateModule() * ActivateAppMenu() * ActivateViewRule() * ActivateACL() * ActivateNotification() * ActivateFlow() * ActivateTest() * ShowFieldClass() * ActivateRecord() * InsertFieldToFormSection() * DefineForm() * DefineFormSection() * DefineList() * DefineRelatedList() * DefineUiPolicyAction() * GetUiActionValue() * UxStyleSetColor() * RecordTransporterPackageUnpack() * AuditQueryRangeACLs()
sys_script_include.name: InstallerAPI
